title: Sri Lanka bans banners, musical instruments at grounds
content: Source: Reuters – By Ranga Sirilal COLOMBO, Feb 18 (Reuters) – Sri Lanka has banned spectators from carrying defamatory banners, posters, glass bottles and also drums and bands to Cricket World Cup venues, police said on Friday.
